overview: Immerse yourself in an island sanctuary, where all your senses are stimulated by unending, relentless passion. Relax and let the island goddesses, Tera Patrick, Briana Banks and Julia Ann, nurture your spirit, among other things. You'll realize it's not the tropical sun that's making you sweat...it's Island Fever! And there is no cure.
tagline: Paradise is Relativeâ€¦ Heaven is Absolute
title: Island Fever
